A whole new experience. Everything extremely well cooked and all waitress were marvelous. Ambient is very comfortable and they are complying with all health measures. Definitely coming back soon with friends and family. You have to try the Routa di Parmigiano plate, very delicious and tasty with all that cheesy experience ")  .

The food was amazing and the customer service experience was impeccable!
Reo or leo was our server he was very skilled knowledgeable and knew the menu to the T the place was clean a bit pricey but worth it!
The best food I ever had, everything is on perfection. Service over 5 star Food over 5 star .thank you

This evening we received the best service from Jackie. As a frequent customer we have always received excellent service but,  I have to say she was very attentive, polite, and made our night very special.

the food here is delicious, great place for a nice dinner date. the staff is knowledgeable on wine and its a great show to watch the pasta being tossed in the cheese wheel.

not bad but not worth a second visit when there are so many other promising restaurants. kitchen needs additional zest

Love it. I got the cheese wheel experience. This has to be the best Alfredo pasta I've had.

1st time there will not go back.  The food was ok. Service was slow.  Waitress looked overwhelmed.  Didn't get the attention we wanted.  Not sure if it's because of Covid-19 we went to celebrate a birthday and the waitress just dropped the chocolate cake in front of the birthday girl and walked away.  Not cool at all.
Great place the food was excelente highly recommended
Excellent service!

The best food in aventura mall. The service was amazing. Lots of room for families and friends to enjoy a day at the mall and grab some exquisite food. The seats are far and apart and they have dividers between the tables indoors. Excellent staff and service. The food is amazing...I definitely recommend this place for a personal and private experience.
the best to the best

I happened to be a Aventura Mall in Aventura Fl. I stopped in to have lunch and I really enjoyed it. I will be back!!

(Translated by Google) Very nice, the food excellent as well as the attention, we had a great time, thank you for making us have a very good time  (Original) Muy bonito, la comida excelente al igual que la atención, la pasamos muy bien , gracias por hacernos pasar un muy buen rato

worst customer service ever, in may/2020 we went to the restaurant and had a double charge, i didn't see that charge after 3 month i went to eat. called the restaurant to let them know i was charge double and they were very helpful( that what i thought).but every time my husband calls they say the same that the money is going back to my card.is been 5 month seen  that and i haven't received any money for a mistake that they made.they are lying to customers not solving my problem and they have a very bad customer service. i dont recommend this restaurant because they lie to customers, telling us that they will return the money that they double charge and at the end is all a lie. my husband talk to Anthony all the time and he said that german and everyone was involved. sending email to corporate and not copying my husband in the email telling us they were calling us and nothing. DONT EVER GO TO DIVIETO.

Omg the Rueta de Parmigiano was fantastic and those jumbo shrimp were on point

Delicious! beautiful decor!!!try the jackie Kennedy or spinach and mozzarella!

This is a perfect example how every restaurant should look and be like. Clean restaurant, professional and polite employees and delicious food - 5 stars experience! On top of that prices are not high at all, which would add 6th star for this review. Tutto bene👌

Absolutely love the pasta and for the price well worth it!! Definitely recommend for pasta lovers. You HAVE to try their  Ruota Di Parmigiano -- this is definitely one of the best pastas I've had and a great experience. HOWEVER, their meat isn't the most flavorful.  Their fig lamb chops and steak is cooked beautifully but could use seasoning. The fig was over bearing for the meat but if you love that figgy taste then you should try it. AND for my octopus lovers -- this is to die for.... it will literally melt in your mouth and full of flavor!!! Will definitely be coming back to try more of their most popular dishes 😊. Also their customer service is great!! They're attentive and have perfect timing.
Good food, pricey as you would expect. It took a long time for a waiter to come to our table. But all in all it was a good experience.
Good staff.  Decent food
Good food, great service ....prices is ok for the place and area.
Not bad. Just not special. Underseasoned.
Great service, friendly staff and good food.

We've eaten here in Aventura a few times and haven't been disappointed yet.  The fish is about the best we have eaten anywhere, including expensive seafood restaurants.  If you're a pasta lover, you'll enjoy it too.  The prices are also very reasonable.
Food was great! Service eggh... alright
Really tasty food even the kids loved. Great service

Everything was delicious, I had the burrata, Branzino, long island iced tea and a couple other things I'm blanking on.

(Translated by Google) A spectacular site! His manager Herman treated us impeccably ... the best of Aventura. Recommended, 5 stars!  (Original) Un sitio espectacular! Su manager Herman nos atendió impecable... lo mejor de Aventura. Recomendado, 5 estrellas!
Delicious food! Outstanding service. Great location. Recommended
(Translated by Google) Unbeatable quality of dishes and attention. Congratulations.  (Original) Calidad de los platos y atención inigualables. Felicidades.

✨HIGHLY RECOMMENDED✨ This was my second time going to DIVIETO for my sister’s bday we made a reservation for 10 ppl and everything was perfect they have a really attentive staff, checking every second of everything was ok if we need something 👌🏻 perfect services , is affordable for everyone if you’re looking for a Italian restaurant in Miami this is the place try it and let me know you experience

Omg! This is the closest I’ll ever get to real authentic Italian food, not made in Italy! The environment is really elegant and clean. I enjoy the option to either dine in or sit on the patio which is covered. The staff is welcoming and VERY ATTENTIVE! Which makes your experience so much better. Hector the manager along with 2 others came to check in our table several times. Our waiter was such a sweetheart, and explained the menu very well! Now on the BEST PART....PASTA!!! Well let’s start with the presentation... the chef comes to your table with fresh handmade pasta and a giant Parmesan wheel. They finish your pasta by tossing it in the wheel, then plating to serve. It was such an amazing sight to see, and the taste. Out of this world!!! Your food is 100% fresh and not frozen. The sauce, cheese and lobster were cooked to perfection. I mean it was truly a beautiful moment in every bite. The fresh bread and oil were so delicious and our drink was delightful. To finish the manager gave us the cutest hand written card and free appetizer for the next visit.( forgot mine by accident)...but the thought just made the experience so special. I would recommend this restaurant to the ENTIRE WORLD!
Best Italian food in the Aventura Mall. Servers give to you a such amazing experience thru the plates. OMG the deserts are INSANE save space for it.

I can't say enough good things about this place. From the moment you walk in, the service is fantastic. The wait staff is courteous and genuine, they keep your water topped off and empty plates quickly removed from the table. The food is to die for, easily the best restaurant in Aventura. The prices are even pretty reasonable! The presentation is fun and enticing, for the dish I got they bring a 90lb wheel of cheese to the table and make it in front of you! Just incredible. And the brownie dessert? Amazing!  I can't wait to go back!!
Not a fan of this place smh disappointed the bread was not fresh the waiter continuously got our orders mixed up the drinks were watered down the steak was extremely dry
The service is outstanding, and the food was really good. Would definitely come back!
I'm so happy with my burger I had to write how good it was . It was good.

Our waiter was awesome,  but the food not too good. The pasta was cold, The filet was gold, when we returned it it took forever to get it back. The manager came to ask how was our food and we told him we were still waiting for the filet then we got it. He gave us a free desert for that, but still for the price I was expecting better quality of food. Not going back.
The service wasn't good they messed up every order. We waited to long for drinks, in a Restaurant that was at half capacity. The food was average.
Very tasty. Highly recommend
Excelent service and great food. The family really enjoyed. This restaurant have become one of our favorites.
Absolutely amazing food!!!!  Best place we ate at here in Miami.  Friendly staff and great atmosphere.
Excellent service and waiters along with absolutely delicious pasta unlike any other I've every had! Overall a lovely experience.
The food was delicious. 100% recommended, excellent choice

Great experience; love the ambiance. The food is unmistakably good. The toast with Prosciutto ham is a must! The desert is good but it’s not the best cheese cake you’ll have. Overall a great experience; and a must!

Amazing place, I ordered my food through Uber eats, they forgot to place the dessert and the manager sent it exclusively to my place fast and they also sent me a free delicious tuxedo bombe awesome customer service highly recommend 🤗
(Translated by Google) Nice place, with very good attention and spectacular food ...  (Original) Bonito lugar, con muy buena atención y la comida espectacular...

Staff is really nice and professional. The place is nice and food is good enough, however, it takes a long time to get your order (ours was cold and salad was mushy), not to mention that the restrooms could really use maintenance and cleaning more often. This place is not cheap so they have to step up their game.
I love it! Great food.

Our first time dining in this restaurant (Aventura location). Our server Jackie (Jadranka) was extremely sweet and friendly, had great food recommendations and provided outstanding service! Everyone else in that location, included hostess and manager were very friendly and helpful! Food was excellent, portions are huge and prices are great. We will definitely come back!
Great service delicious food. Try Ruota!
Love this place! Clarissa is the best waitress!! Definitely would go back due to her outgoing persona and tasty food.

Love this place, love the service , people and prices. Julian our waiter served our tables of 10 flawlessly.  German and Chef came out to personally say thank you for choosing them for this small celebration.  The pasta in the Parm Reggiano wheel plus the Tomahawk Steak is as good as it gets.  I'll be back  and hopefully if we head out west we will join you in Doral as well. THANK YOU!
(Translated by Google) Excellent all very rich  (Original) Excelente todo muy rico
Nice atmosphere,delicious food and very important:absolutely amazing service!!!I had a great time!!!
Food was tasty and the service was excellent. I will definitely be back. The entire experience was superb!

I had dinner there last night with my family. The food was delicious and the service was impeccable. We ordered the scampi pizza with goat cheese that I loved, then we all got pasta, my son replaced the capellini with penne for the wild mushroom and that was delicious, my daughter ordered the spaghetti with meatballs that she enjoyed, my husband ordered the Vongole which was delicious and I was in the mood for the Frutti Di Mare and it was perfect. Also the platter of warm bread they serve in the beginning with seasoned olive oil and butter was really very good. We will definitely go back, the restaurant is beautiful and we loved the cozy booths.
It was ok! It's definitely worth another trip.
(Translated by Google) All exquisite! Excellent atention  (Original) Todo exquisito! Muy buena atencion

Excellent
Food was delicious and service was fantastic

Coming here alot these few weeks almost month has been amazing, the people who work their always make me feel at home and comfortable. The food is spectacular and each item I have tried on the menu has always been the best...if I am ever hungry or longing for a glass of white wine I always know where to go.

Divieto Ristorante is my new home. Iker Ibanez the best bartender with outstanding service. Always spoiling me. One of my favorite drinks is ‘la passione’ very spicy. The best service ever this places is amazing. The food is delicious also the manager Herman wow so professional. Definitely a must to come check this place out.
Excellent!!!!
The food was amazing and the service as well. Really nice ambience. Our server, Victor, was very friendly and attentive. I'll definitely come back.

(Translated by Google) For the first time I tried this restaurant in Aventura, I found a very warm and well decorated place, a distinguished atmosphere, I was attended by Julian who left no detail to attend, an excellent waiter, and what to say about the food, the delicious entrance, With a presentation also distinguished, the main dish according to everything mentioned, my assessment is 10 points in all, five stars is little  (Original) Por primera vez probé este retaurante en Aventura, me encontré con un lugar muy cálido y bien decorado, un ambiente distinguido, fui atendido por Julian quien no dejo detalle por atender, un excelente mesero, y que decir de la comida, la entrada riquísima, con una presentación también distinguida, el plato principal acorde con todo lo mencionado, mi valoración es 10 puntos en todo, cinco estrellas es poco

my second time there. very good very fresh, great service and very reasonable prices. will go back for sure

(Translated by Google) We ordered octopus as a starter and some fried squid, the difference was that it had some breaded vegetables, which made the difference. I ordered a steak with a wood sauce, if I liked it but expect something else. I ordered some noodles in marinara sauce and I really don't recommend it. We ordered a pizza, which really surprised me, because it was inedible, it was very hard on the edges. We ordered a Neapolitan chicken that was good. What can I say about attention, wait more. Such a beautiful restaurant, with a spectacular atmosphere, I was really disappointed. The dessert was recommended by the waiter, it was a brownie with ice cream, all homemade. If I liked. The service is not very good, they are still learning. We will give them another chance anyway.  (Original) Pedimos pulpo  como entrada y unos calamares fritos, la diferencia fue que tenía algo de verduras apanadas, que hacían la diferencia. pedí un steak con una salsa madera, si me gustó pero espere algo más. Pedí unos fideos en salsa marinara y la verdad que no le recomiendo. Nos pedimos una pizza , que la verdad me dejo sorprendida, porque fue incomible, estaba durísima en los bordes. Nos pedimos un pollo a la napolitana que si estaba buen sabor. Que puedo decir de la atención ,  espere más . Un restaurante tan bonito , con un ambiente espectacular, me dejo realmente decepcionada. El postre fue recomendado por el mesero, fue un brownie con helado , todo hecho en casa. Si me gusto. El servicio no muy bueno , están aprendiendo aún . Les daremos otra oportunidad de todas maneras.
Really great service and food is amazing!!!

Nice place !! Excelentt food!!

I went there today for the first time. After no one approach us for 20 min I asked for assistance. A very rude Spanish woman came and said with an attitude madam!!!! I am not your servant but I guess I can get you what you need. I said to her "madam " that won't be necessary we don't want to inconvenient you and we left went to serafina were we always have a wonderful experience. I have say we got very upset

Thank you for my amazing experience. I’m glad I have found  this place . Service  is the best, food is very very delicious and place is very friendly. Thank you Su and Herman for taking great care of us!
Great service and food!
Great food, drinks and atmosphere!
Great customer service
The table side pasta was great. Everyone from the hostess to the busboys provided excellent service.
(Translated by Google) Excellent experience, very good service, thanks  (Original) Excelente experiencia,  un servicio muy bueno , gracias

The food at Divieto Ristorante is very good! Our waiter was very, very kind to us. He returned several times to ask how our food was. The staff here was overall very kind, and went above and beyond to help us get a reservation. This restaurant is located right near the Disney Store in the Aventura Mall!
Wonderful dessert, service and food

Last night's dinner with the family was Aah-mazing & DELICIOUS, from the cocktails 🍻, to the food 🍴, to the decor , to the CAPPUCCINO ☕ and best of all THE COMPANY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦.  I would highly recommend this place to anyone.
Excellent! Great food, great service!!
The food was ok... but be prepared to wait almost an hour to close out your tab If you are with a big party.
Servers are really nice, if it’s your first time they explain about the restaurant and how it all began and the food is great!
Love their famous Pasta a la Routa, delicious appetizers and desserts.
Amazing food and service! The best pasta in town, and the cheesecake was delicious.
(Translated by Google) Excellent food and ate9👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👏🏼👏🏼  (Original) Excelente la comida y la ate9👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👏🏼👏🏼

(Translated by Google) Delicious food, very good Italian food, the spaghetti is top quality with an unbeatable cheese, super excellent service, impeccable cleanliness. This is my 3rd time eating at Divieto Restaurant But the first time visiting the Aventura Mall location Food is delicious in both location The services is great. Tried the pear pasta super is a most. Great time and delicious food

(Translated by Google) Terrible place I went to eat at night and for a moment I was watching the kitchen line and the chefs saw each other arguing, terrible experience.  (Original) Terrible lugar fui en la noche a comer y por un momento me quede viendo la línea de cocina y los cocineros se veían discutiendo entre ellos, terrible experiencia.

(Translated by Google) Very good everything and very happy with the service. Sergio the manager was very kind and attentive to us.  (Original) muy bueno todo y muy contento con el servicio. Sergio el manager fue muy amable y atento con nosotros.
Excellent service and nice decor but unfortunately the food is terrible. Something as simple as meatballs taste like the ones from Ikea right off the microwave.

I went for lunch and the appetizers took 40 minutes to arrive So did my pizza. This is unacceptable it wasn’t like this in the beginning. The food isn’t even much Italian more like a made up fusion. Won’t recommend. Serafina and Bella Luna is sooo much better.

Great food and wonderful service. The staff is very friendly and attentive even if the person is not your direct server. The staff checks on the tables frequently and makes you feel like an important guest. The atmosphere is very relaxing for a night out with friends. Our party of 7 really enjoyed the night. And they give you a mini dessert if it happens to be your birthday. The best service I have received a while.

THE BEST SERVICE WE EVER HAD. We were a group of 18 from Toronto ,Canada. We we're giving the V.I.P room. The staff were so kind. Everyone was welcoming. The food was one of the best we had. All the food was good it ranged from $17-$32. Every single person in our group loved what they ordered. That never happens. We are all very picky. But this restaurant made it happen. The vibe was great. The manager was very nice. We we're hesitant to go to this location as it didn't have that many reviews but we were advised by the manager it was because they only open up a month ago.we are glad we went. MUST GO YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!!

I was so excited to try this new restaurant which opened up in Aventura mall. We went for Lunch on a weekday and what a disappointment. We ordered appetizers which took 40 minutes to arrive, and the main dishes 60 minutes. We sat for two hours from the time we sat down to the time we finished with dessert. The server had an attitude and the manager was even worse. The food was good but unfortunately the all experience was terrible. They are plenty of other Italian Restaurants in the mall that puts this one to shame. They give you an attitude if you have pets and won’t let you sit outside with them. May I say that my pet or a service animal with a certificate. The bill was pricy as well which is not what I want to pay for a bad experience.
I loved it. The food and the service are excellent.
Great place and amazing food !!!

(Translated by Google) The restaurant is cozy with antique decoration. The table we went to was 12 people and we were all satisfied. The food is very tasty. And the pressure as in almost all places that respect a little of Miami, the food has a price that ranges from 5 to 35. Very Well, I recommend it.  (Original) El restaurante es acogedor con decoración  de antigüedades. La mesa que fuimos era de 12 personas  y  todos quedamos satisfechos es exquisita la comida muy sabrosa .y el presio como en casi todos los lugares que se respeten un poco de miami la comida tiene un precio  que oscila desde los 5 hasta los 35. Muy bueno lo recomiendo.

The food is made with high quality and fresh ingredients. Our waitress needed better training to earn a 5th Star.  The complimentary warm bread is served with oil and dried herbs. It’s tasty.  The chicken Parmesan is large and enough for two people to share. We chose bow tie pasta to replace the linguini.  Park in the JC penny garage by the bus stop. You can use resy website for reservations.

(Translated by Google) New location located at Shopping Aventura. Simple but tasty food. Attentive staff. Only missing Italian background music. We will definitely be back to taste more delights. Be sure to try spinaci al formaggio input.  (Original) Local novo localizado no Shopping Aventura. Comida simples mas saborosa. Pessoal atencioso. Só faltou música ambiente italiana. Com certeza voltaremos para provar mais delícias. Não deixem de provar de entrada spinaci al formaggio.

I was just here for dinner with friends. We shared the burrata, spinach dip and bruschetta as our appetizers. All were fresh and delicious. For dinner we all had pasta dishes !  Highly recommend the gnocchi! Dessert was tuxedo bombe !!! That was the most deletable chocolate dessert of all time. Great addition to the Aventura Mall. Highly recommended!
Today I went to this restaurant at lunch and I really like it. The server Juan gave us the best service ever.
We knew this restaurant is very good. But we have a very good and enjoyable time. Service excellent, and also the food very good. Don't miss it if you are in the Aventura Mall.

The restaurant is very well decorated, good service, the Parmesan Route is a novel way to make the dish, but they don't know how to prepare it. The dish should be served extremely hot and you need to either use something like a kitchen torch to melt the cheese while mixing the pasta inside the giant Parmesan cheese, or after mixed it, return it to the pan and heat well again before serving. I tried the dish, but it came almost cold with a very strong Parmesan taste.

My family and I had a TERRIBLE night due to the management here. We had a reservation for 8pm and arrived promptly. Reservation was for a party of 3. When we arrived the hostess was less than welcoming. We told her we had a reservation and were told that even though we had a reservation it was going to be at least a 10 minute wait. The hostess was rude and rolled her eyes after making us aware that we needed to wait. So, although we weren’t happy we understood and patiently sat down to wait. Soon after 3 large parties arrived. One was seated right upon arrival and another argued that they had an 8:15pm reservation and needed to be seated exactly by that time. They bullied the manager into being seated before us. Although we had already been waiting for at least 15 minutes and had an 8pm reservation. Of course we felt belittled and appalled that they would sit several people before us( a party of 3)! My husband and I decided to leave and will NEVER return to this location. I recommend the Doral location instead of this piece of junk location. Shame on the management for rewarding bad behavior!

Have been to the Divieto in Doral, and while this location is smaller, it still has a ton of heart. The energy and happiness of the staff (chefs to servers) definitely is felt in the experience you have here. Johnny was an incredible server and was more than happy to offer his own suggestions and be available whenever needed. Supported by it's prohibition era theme, the drinks offered here are extensive and well-crafted. The white sangria was not overly sweet and had a nice balance. The smoked old fashioned was the best I ever had and is a bit of a cool spectacle when it's brought to the table. The meals were exceptional - Tuscan salmon grilled and seasoned perfectly and the the lamb chops were cooked and dressed to perfection as well. Ambiance is relaxed yet still lively and comfy. There are also gluten free options for those who require the choice. Prices are well suited for the experience here.
Table side pasta is an experience to be had...add some shrimp, lobster or chicken on the side and you'll be set. The service is excellent and Management staff is delightful.
The food is really good. And the staff is very nice. The food didn't take long to arrive. Good quality for what you pay.

I went last Sunday because a couple a friends told me about this new place in Aventura Mall, and I tried it out. The hostess was nice to sit me down, and I didn't have to wait too long, and the server Juan Carlos, I think he mentioned he was Peruvian, he explained the specialties of the restaurant. I ended up eating Mascarpone Pasta, really good food. and he also suggested some signature drinks, that I'd like to try next time I come here. Everyone took the time to make sure I was comfortable and food was well done. Nice restaurant inside the mall

For a restaurant that opened only a week ago, the staff was well trained, with only one little hiccup that was quickly rectified, the service was top notch and food was delicious. We look forward to more visits.
Unprofessional management Nothing Special, Junk food with high prices, Do not recommend

I came in early prior to dinning to inquire about Vegan options on their menu and the staff was super friendly and helpful! The manager was very nice and energetic.  Once I came back to dine with my friend I was greeted with a smile and sat at a table the atmosphere was friendly and positive everyone had a nice attitude and professionalism. The quality of the food was great and pricing was what you’d expect in a location as such.  The experience was amazing and I met the manager a second time whereas she stayed to chat for a bit. If you’re in the Aventura area check out this location in the Aventura mall. You will not be disappointed.  Thank you for having us,  Manny.
